qas.question: Has public school enrollment dropped or increased in the last 5 years?
How many public schools have been closed in 2013?
How much does the city spend per year per child?

context: The city's K-12 enrollment in district run schools has <a0_0>dropped<a0_0/> in the last five years from 156,211 students in 2010 to 130,104 students in 2015. During the same time period, the enrollment in charter schools has increased from 33,995 students in 2010 to 62,358 students in 2015. This consistent drop in enrollment has led the city to close <a1_0>24<a1_0/> of its public schools in 2013. During the 2014 school year, the city spent an average of <a2_0>$12,570<a2_0/> per pupil, below the average among comparable urban school districts.
